modName: Thieves Guild Hot Pants for Sundracon Male
summary: Extra roomy pouch up front for your favorite tool.
descriptionHtml:
Does not include roller skates or terry cloth headband.

Comes in two varieties: replacer if you want all of the male thieves in hot pants, or craftable if you want to pick which guys to be shamelessly objectified. 

Requires Sundracon mod from Better Males: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488/

I wont be making a Favored Soul version of this mesh, but feel free to take a crack at it if you like. :)

--Seedye
author: Seedye
